p: Viral RNA was extracted from 500 μL HIV-1 positive plasma specimens after being concentrated using a High Pure Viral RNA kit (Roche, USA). Viral full-length gag (nucleotides 790–2292 using HXB2 as calibrator) and partial pol genes encompassing the entire protease and partial reverse transcriptase regions (nucleotides 2085–5096 using HXB2 as calibrator) were amplified separately using reverse transcriptional nested PCR as previously described [ 19]. Briefly, the first round of PCR was fulfilled using a TaKaRa one-step RT-PCR kit, and the second round PCR using High Fidelity Taq (Invitrogen, USA) with primers and thermal cycling conditions as described elsewhere [ 19, 20]. Positive PCR products were subjected to Sanger sequencing after purification with a variety of internal specific primers (available on request).
